funFacts.label: Biggest Code Avalanche
funFacts.detail: One PR in dl_object_detection rewired the shard Docker image with +79,101/-65,884 lines—an entire mountain range of change.

funFacts.label: Q4 Turbo Mode
funFacts.detail: Almost half your PRs landed in Q4 (40/89) — end-of-year shipping streak unlocked.

funFacts.label: The Review Machine
funFacts.detail: You were the team’s merge-lane traffic controller: 320 reviews, including 111 for @ylavi-cloudinary and 60 for @aviadmx.

funFacts.label: Largest PR by Files Touched
funFacts.detail: The Git LFS migration in dl_object_detection touched 1,083 files—clean hands, dirty repo.

funFacts.label: Build & Deploy Whisperer
funFacts.detail: You repeatedly tuned Jenkins checkout/LFS/shallow clone flows—keeping CI fast, reliable, and drama-free across multiple PRs.

bigRocks.title: Shard Docker Megalift
bigRocks.impact: Modernized the shard Docker stack at scale, unblocking smoother builds and deployments for the model pipeline.

bigRocks.title: Teacher Data Agent: Factory Mode
bigRocks.impact: Built a production-ready teacher-data generation pipeline with rate limiting, checkpointing, and cost estimation for VLM distillation.

bigRocks.title: Training Infra: Student VLM Bootcamp
bigRocks.impact: Delivered end-to-end training infrastructure (LoRA, callbacks, tests) to make distillation training reliable and repeatable.

bigRocks.title: VQA Structured Output Upgrade
bigRocks.impact: Added structured output support (schema extraction + tool-use parameters) to make VQA responses machine-parseable and robust.

bigRocks.title: Logo Recognition Enters the Chat
bigRocks.impact: Introduced a full logo-recognition capability (detector + embedder + utilities + tests) to expand content analysis power.

quarterlyActivity.highlights: Early-year foundation work: mocking/test stability and steady dl_utils bumps to keep pipelines healthy.
Precision quarter: super-res transparency fixes and RealESRGANer refactors that made edge cases behave.
Feature wave: OpenAI logprobs + confidence scoring, Flux txt2img adventures, and model upgrades landing fast.
Full send: LFS + Jenkins tune-ups, new models (Logo Recognition), and the dl_research distillation pipeline coming online.

topRepos.name: dl_object_detection
topRepos.funFact: Your main arena: from VQA confidence scoring to CI/LFS migrations—this repo got the blockbuster treatment.

topRepos.name: dl_utils
topRepos.funFact: The reliability engine room: BrushNet training pipeline, TRT10 updates, and a steady stream of performance-minded fixes.

topRepos.name: dl_research
topRepos.funFact: Small PR count, massive impact: you stood up the distillation data + training infrastructure in a single Q4 surge.

yearInReview.headline: The Year of Shipping (and Shepherding)
yearInReview.tagline: 89 PRs merged, 176,768 lines added, 320 reviews—big model features, bigger infra, and a whole lot of team unblock.
